sentences.cn: “ 这是芝加哥西北区, "杜洛埃说道.

sentences.en: A strange light appeared in the northwest.
sentences.cn: 一束奇异的光线在西北方闪现.

sentences.en: All those happenings had further repercussions in the Northwest.
sentences.cn: 所有这一切事件都进一步在西北产生了反响.

sentences.en: Alte, in the hills northwest of Loule, is the Algarve's most picturesque village.
sentences.cn: 位于洛莱西北部山区的阿尔特，是阿尔加维风景最美丽的村庄。
他经常乘坐西北航空公司的飞机.

sentences.en: He was born in the northwest.
I'd like two seats on today's Northwest Flight 7 to Detroit, please.
sentences.cn: 我想订两张今天西北航空公司7班次到底特律的机票.

sentences.en: Take the narrow lane going northwest parallel with the railway line.
sentences.cn: 走那条与铁路线平行的通向西北的窄路。

sentences.en: Take the northwest road; it is the shortest way.
sentences.cn: 走向西北的那条路, 那是最近的路.

sentences.en: The address is 2025 M Street, Northwest, Washington, DC, 20036.
sentences.cn: 地址为华盛顿特区，西北区，M大街2025号，邮政编码20036。

sentences.en: The boat began to move slowly off toward the northwest.
sentences.cn: 船儿慢慢地向西北方向驶去.

sentences.en: The country lies on the northwest of France.
the northwest suburbs of the city
The wind is blowing from the northwest.

words.tran_cn: 北方的，向北的；来自北方的
西北大风，西北来的风暴

phrases.tran_cn: 西北航空（财富500强公司之一，总部位于美国，主要经营航空公司）

trans.tran_cn: 在西北的，西北部的，向西北的，（风、光线）来自西北方的
trans.tran_en: a northwest wind comes from the northwest
If you go northwest, you travel toward the northwest
the direction that is exactly between north and west
the direction that is exactly between north and west
